# Mixed Resources Fixture

## Purpose

Repository with a mix of all resource types to test discovery of multiple resource types in one location.

## Structure

```
commands/
  cmd1.md
skills/
  skill1/
    SKILL.md
agents/
  agent1.md
```

One of each resource type in a single repository.

## Test Use Cases

- Discovery of multiple resource types in one repository
- Correct type identification (command vs skill vs agent)
- Mixed resource validation
- Repository-wide resource scanning
